name: Hold Your Horses
description:
A platform game that when you are hit by an enemy you lose the control of the character.

Instructions to play the game:

  • Move with WASD or the arrows key.
  • You jump with the SPACE Button.
  • You Slide With the LEFT Shift Button (You can only slide while you are moving).
  • When you lose you can click the retry? text with the mouse to restart the level.

Note about the game:

  • The game doesn't have a main menu neither pause menu
  • To exit the game need to use ALT+F4 key
  • The game only has 3 levels.
  • When you reach the goal of the final level, the game doesn't end (this is a last minute bug).
